channel.title: Did i set up hosting right?
channel.description: well i followed like every guide on the forums to host a server. but its still says errorconnecting to server. if anyone could check it for me add my msn lordofd93@hotmail.com you can check if you got teamviewer. Im currently hosting mithscape v1 made by`whiz. i use vista and my router is linkys. and could it be the source has a anti leech in it so i cant host it?

item.title: Did i set up hosting right?
item.dc:creator: @danny_508 danny 508
item.description:

i tryed all that stuff nothing works

item.title: Did i set up hosting right?
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

Ah… no need to Port forward, just use uTorrent and change the Port to 43594 and use No-ip and woot! u can run ur server wid out logging and saying error.

Read full topic
item.source: Did i set up hosting right?

item.title: Did i set up hosting right?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

OP, you’re not allowed to offer rewards (RS accounts, money, etc), even if the reward was legit.

Read full topic
item.source: Did i set up hosting right?

item.title: Did i set up hosting right?
item.dc:creator: @Yodoxin Yodoxin
item.description:
@Yodoxin wrote:

Are you trying to connect to the IP or localhost? I’d recommend putting 127.0.0.1 in the server IP field while your server is running.

Read full topic
